summary: The video discusses a man named Anthony Lofredo from Montpellier, France, who identifies himself as 'Black Alien.' He began his transformation at the age of 27 to appear less human. Anthony has extensively tattooed his body and undergone numerous cosmetic surgeries, including the removal of his tongue, nose, ears, and two fingers. He has also dyed his teeth black and changed the whites of his eyes to black. Additionally, he has had silicone implants inserted. He claims that amputating his own fingers made him feel more complete but acknowledges that he is only 46% on his way to becoming an alien. His future plans, which include leg amputations and significant weight loss, are described as unsettling. Despite his self-harming actions, he insists he has the freedom to live the life he chooses. He mentions being asked to leave public places like restaurants due to his appearance.
keywords: Anthony Lofredo, Black Alien, Montpellier, France, transformation, cosmetic surgery, amputation, tattoos, self-harm, freedom, alien, body modification
